text: Sam Beazley (29 March 1916 - 12 June 2017) was a British actor. He began acting as a teenager in the 1930s. He appeared with John Gielgud in productions of Hamlet (1934) and Romeo and Juliet (1935).Nicholas de Jongh, "Dangerous liaisons: The secret life of John Gielgud" , The Independent, 15 February 2010. He returned to acting when he was 75. Since then has appeared in a variety of stage and movie productions. In his 90s, he became a painter.Garald Isaaman, "Feature: Exhibition â€“ Sam Beazley's paintings is at the Millinery Works Gallery until August 28" , Islington Tribune, 19 August 2010.John Freedman, "Playhouse of the World", The Moscow Times, 20 March 1998. He was known for his role as Everard in Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007).
